Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; GROUND
Name: Dish
Description: One of many dozens of examples of a dish with a wide flat base, flared body and rounded lip in continuation of the body wall. See L 170, 171, 172 and 173.
